title: Hill Racing Game
description: A simple hill climbing racing game with physics and controls
tech: LocalStorage (for saving high scores and game progress)
Collision Detection (for handling interactions between the car and the terrain)
Sprite Animation (for animating the car and environment)
Particle Effects (for adding visual effects like dust and explosions)
Game Loop (for managing the game state and updates)
Input Handling (for managing user controls and interactions)
Level Design (for creating different tracks and challenges)
Responsive Design (for making the game playable on different devices and screen sizes)
